mapper.select: select t_testbusiness_ui.*,sp.project_name from t_testbusiness_ui inner join sys_project sp on t_testbusiness_ui .project_id = sp.id where t_testbusiness_ui.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select t_testbusiness_ui.*,sp.project_name from t_testbusiness_ui inner join sys_project sp on t_testbusiness_ui .project_id = sp.id where t_testbusiness_ui.`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
